channel.title: Trump on Blog de jesvs
channel.description: Recent content in Trump on Blog de jesvs

item.title: What to Do About Trump?
item.description: When the levers of power are seized by the small hands of hateful men, you work hard, you stand with those who are most vulnerable, and you don’t give up until it’s morning again. The rest is commentary. Liel Leibovitz – What to Do About Trump? The Same Thing My Grandfather Did in 1930s Vienna.
